General.Name: Isaac Engineering Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Isaac Engineering Co., Ltd., an engineering service company, provides optimal solutions for process and factory automation. It is involved in the design, manufacturing, installation, commissioning, and maintenance of automation solutions in the smart factory, and smart manufacturing and energy fields. The company offers plant and equipment automation solutions for semiconductor, steel, oil and gas, refinery, petrochemical, and power plants, as well as for pharmaceutical, paper, and food and beverage businesses. It also provides enterprise resource planning, quality management system, supply chain management, big data, product life cycle management, product data management, manufacturing execution system, automation, digital manufacturing, visualization system, and cloud-based IOT solutions. In addition, the company offers GIS preventive diagnosis, transformer prevention diagnosis, switchboard/cable prevention diagnosis, and power conversion solutions. Further, it provides real time large capacity data processing, data lake platform, facility failure prediction, and relationship analysis solutions. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Gunpo-si, South Korea.
